overview: Laibach North American Tour 2004  and Laibach live 13.12.2004 La Locomotive, Paris, France  This Film is a unique document of the Laibach tour, during the traumatic post-election atmosphere in The USA, a country deeply divided by two opposite political and cultural poles. The tour has been therefore named "The Divided States of America Tour".
title: Laibach: Divided States of America
